channel.title: Need a Really detailed TuT!
channel.description:
Hey guys, it's been a while since i was coding, so ive forgotten how 2 add... commands... This has been bugging me!
I need some1 to completly refresh my brain, basically, it's going to be like teaching a baby to eat it's dinner :D
Ok, this is what i need help with
How to lay out commands (like [code]else if (command.startsWith("pickup") && (playerRights >= 2)) {[/code]
I need to know how to add stuff like that, but as ::starter which can only be used once.
I also need to know how to do tele commands.
Finally, ive never been able to work this one out :(
When you type ::info or ::rules it brings up a list of rules and stuff, like a command list.
Thanks for reading and im hoping somebody will help me out ^^
(For you searching noobs, i have searched the forums and all i could find out was how to add commands, i thought this was the one for me! Clicked it and i figured the thread had been removed... So theres no need to tell me 2 search)
~johno
~~~EDIT~~~
Just rememberd, when im walking around varrock or anywhere in runescape it comes up with this
wildy -67398434 How do i make to say "SafeZone" or "Danger! pedo about!" lol joke, how do i make it say "Wildy"

item.title: Need a Really detailed TuT!
item.dc:creator: @johno2 johno2
item.description:
@johno2 wrote:

Hey guys, it’s been a while since i was coding, so ive forgotten how 2 add… commands… This has been bugging me!

I need some1 to completly refresh my brain, basically, it’s going to be like teaching a baby to eat it’s dinner

Ok, this is what i need help with

How to lay out commands (like else if (command.startsWith("pickup") && (playerRights >= 2)) {

I need to know how to add stuff like that, but as ::starter which can only be used once.

I also need to know how to do tele commands.

Finally, ive never been able to work this one out

When you type ::info or ::rules it brings up a list of rules and stuff, like a command list.

Thanks for reading and im hoping somebody will help me out ^^

(For you searching noobs, i have searched the forums and all i could find out was how to add commands, i thought this was the one for me! Clicked it and i figured the thread had been removed… So theres no need to tell me 2 search)

~johno

~EDIT~

Just rememberd, when im walking around varrock or anywhere in runescape it comes up with this

wildy -67398434 How do i make to say “SafeZone” or “Danger! pedo about!” lol joke, how do i make it say “Wildy”
